document.masterDocTitle: A Catalog of Scolytidae and Platypodidae (Coleoptera), Supplement 3 (2000 - 2010), with notes on subfamily and tribal reclassifications

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A Catalog of Scolytidae and Platypodidae (Coleoptera), Supplement 3 (2000 - 2010), with notes on subfamily and tribal reclassifications

subSubSection.paragraph: The following is a list of significant references that treat the entire family or major portions thereof. Included are references to symposium proceedings, keys, catalogs, checklists, and books in addition to references to other categories.
The following is a list of significant taxonomic and biological references arranged by subfamilies, tribes, genera and species.
